text: Sanjana Anand is an Indian actress who appears in Kannada films. ==Career== She made her debut with Chemistry of Kariyappa which was released in February 2019. Her second film Male Billu was released in July 2019. She is set to appear as the female lead in Duniya Vijay's directorial debut Salaga, in Shokiwala opposite Ajay Rao, in Kushkahttps://www.newindianexpress.com/entertainment/kannada/2019/may/29/sanjana- anand-bags-her-fourth-project-1983202.html and in Kshatriya opposite Chiranjeevi Sarja. She will also feature in the web series Honeymoon directed by Vikram Yoganand. She was also reported to be one of the two lead actresses who will star opposite Nirup Bhandari in the romantic thriller tentatively named Window Seat. ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable" |+Key | style="background:#FFFFCC;"| | Denotes films that have not yet been released |} ===Film=== {|class="wikitable sortable" !
